bug.author: joaolcaas
bug.summary: Unable to import syft from master branch
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
When I try to import syft from the master branch, an error shows up. Look like a Command that before were in pythreepio.utils is there no longer. <denchmark-h:h2>How to Reproduce</denchmark-h>
install syft on master branch import syft
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected Behavior</denchmark-h>
ImportError: cannot import name 'Command' from 'pythreepio.utils' (/home/joaolucas/Documents/PySyft/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/pythreepio/utils.py) UPDATE: PYSYFT IS BROKEN AS LONG AS THIS IS OPEN
